workout_sd: Best fat loss home workout for women who are working/Homemakers.
workout_desc:
This workout needs to be performed in a continious fashion. There a a total of 6 exercises which focuses on working of all the major muscle groups and also core muscles to help you to build the core strength also.

Warmup

  1. Spot Jog
  2. Jumps
  3. Cross Toe Touches
  4. Namaste Pose

Workout

  1. Burpee basic with jump followed by pushup pose/planks
  2. Sumo squats - Legs more than shoulder width
  3. Walkouts with hand - wide leg
  4. Mountain Climbers
  5. Squats/Chair Sit

These are the 5 exercises which needs to be times based on your comfort level. Use the Interval Timer app as explained in the video.

workout_sd: Focus on bicep anatomy to get better results.
workout_desc:
This workout is based on the antomy of the bicep as explained in the video. There are two heads of bicep which is the reason we call Bi-cep in which Bi means 2. Apart from working on just the bicep heads, we need to focus on one more muscle which is Brachialis wich helps for the peak of the bicep.

Warmup

  1. light weight dumbell curls
  2. chin-ups

Workout

  1. Alernating Dumbell Curls
  2. Ez rod Bicep Curl
  3. Cable Curls
  4. Rope Curls
  5. Concentration Curls

Tip: Perform all the exercises to failure irrespective of the weight you pick but make sure you stay in the range of 8-15.

workout_sd: Simple yet effective workout which focuses on overall chect muscles.
workout_desc:
This woorkout is for the intermediate to advance athletes who have built mind muscle connection and also have a better undertanding of posture and exercise.

Warmup

  1. Cable Fly - Light weight
  2. Pushup - 2 sets

Workout

  1. Incline chest press - 7 sets
  2. Superset - 3 sets
    • Seated cable fly, high to low. Core tight
    • Push-up to failure
  3. Superset- 3 sets
    • Incline push-up
    • Incline Close grip plate press
  4. Machine fly - 3 sets
  5. Weighted pushup - 3 sets

Rest Period: 60sec

Tip: Only for the first exercise which is 7 sets, try to perform a side chect pose after each set.

workout_sd: Back workout to increase the thickness of the back.
workout_desc:
Workout to focus on all the major back muscles and also to help you build the thickness of back.

Warmup

  1. Resistance band rowing
  2. Pullup - 1 set to failure

Workout

  1. Plates Rowing - 5 sets
  2. Uinlateral T-bar row - 3 sets
  3. Dropset
    • Machine lat pulldown
  4. Close grip cable pull down [light weight] - 3 sets
  5. Unilateral dumbbell deadlift - 3 sets

Rest Period: 60sec

workout_sd: Killer leg workout which leaves your legs shivering.
workout_desc:
This leg workout focuses more on Quads and Hamstring which are the major and bigger group of muscles in the lower body.

Warmup

  1. Walking Lunges
  2. Squat position - Holds

Workout

  1. Machine incline leg press [shoulder wide] - 5 sets to failure
  2. Sumo deal lift - 3 sets
  3. Leg extensions - 4 sets
  4. Superset - 3 sets
    • Walking lunges with sand bag
    • Jump squats
  5. Barbell Box squats - 4 sets

Rest Period: 90sec

workout_sd: Complete shoulder workout for roundness and fullness.
workout_desc:
Focusing on the anatomy of the shoulder, this workout is designed to work on all the muscle groups in deltoids to give you the roundness and fullness.

Warmup

  1. Internal and External rotation using cable
  2. Decline Pushups - 2 sets

Workout

  1. Seated Dumbell Shoulder press - 3 sets
  2. Superset - 4 sets
    • Unilateral read delt cable fly
    • Plate front raises
  3. Superset - 3 sets
    • Bent over dumbbell 45° raises
    • Hindu push-up
  4. Rope Face Pulls - 4 sets

Rest Period: 60sec

workout_sd: Workout for Bicep and Tricep muscle using flexion-extension technique
workout_desc:
Many say that we should never train bicep and tricep muscles together but it depends on how well you have trained your muscles to remember movements. We can combine the push pull technique to increase the blood flow in both the working and antagonist muscles.

Warmup

  1. Tricep dips - 2 sets
  2. Chinups - 2 sets

Workout

  1. Superset - 4 sets
    • Preacher curl
    • Rope tricep pushdowns
  2. Dropset - 3 sets
    • Standing Dumbell curl
  3. Ez rod - lyring tricep skulcrusher - 5 sets
  4. Superset - 3 sets
    • Reverse grip curl
    • Tricep kickbacks

Rest Period: 40sec

workout_sd: Complete Ab workout focusing all all the abdominal muscles.
workout_desc:
There are basically 5 different muscle groups which we need to focus when we say abdominals. This workout focuses on all the muscle groups required to build a complete 6 pack abs.

Workout

  1. 1min planks - 3 sets
  2. Hanging Leg Raises - 3 sets
  3. Superset - 3 sets
    • Situps
    • Reverse leg crunches
  4. Knee to elbow crunches - 3sets
  5. Back extension - 3 sets
  6. Side planks [30sec each side] - 3 sets 

Rest Period: 30sec
